message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to make a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $100 is a bit low for this product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe $100 is a fair price for this product. Would you consider $120?
